intents.name: ProviderAuthentication
trainingPhrases: My NPI is 1234567890
I'm calling from Springfield Medical Center, my NPI number is 1234567890
This is Dr. Johnson, NPI 1234567890
My National Provider Identifier is 1234567890
Provider number 1234567890
I'm a healthcare provider, my NPI is 1234567890
Calling about Medicare billing, my NPI is 1234567890
ID number 1234567890
My provider identification is 1234567890

parameters.name: npiNumber
prompts: Could you please provide your 10-digit National Provider Identifier (NPI)?
I'll need your NPI to verify your identity. What is it?

fulfillmentMessages: Thank you for providing your NPI. Let me verify your information...

intents.name: CheckClaimStatusCode
trainingPhrases: I need to check claim status for CLM-2024-001
What's the status of my claim CLM-2024-001?
Can you look up claim number CLM-2024-001?
I submitted claim CLM-2024-001 last week, what's happening with it?
Claim CLM-2024-001 was denied, why?
Status of claim CLM-2024-001
I want to know about claim CLM-2024-001
Check claim CLM-2024-001
What happened to my claim CLM-2024-001?
I'm calling about a claim denial

parameters.name: claimId
prompts: What is the claim number you'd like me to check?
Please provide the claim ID. It should be in the format CLM-YYYY-NNN.
Which claim number do you need information about?

fulfillmentMessages: Let me look up that claim for you...

intents.name: PolicyQuestion
trainingPhrases: I have a question about billing policies
Can you explain the incident-to billing rules?
What are the requirements for telehealth services?
I need clarification on ICD-10 coding
Tell me about Medicare Part B coverage
How do I use modifier 25?
What is the global surgery period?
I don't understand the prior authorization process
Can you explain MSP rules?
What documentation do I need for claims?
Policy question about coverage
I need help understanding billing guidelines

parameters.name: policyTopic
prompts: What specific policy topic can I help you with?
Which area do you have questions about? For example: billing, coding, coverage, or enrollment?
What policy would you like more information on?

fulfillmentMessages: I can help you with that policy question. Let me provide some information...
Let me look up the policy guidelines for $policyTopic...

intents.name: RequestLiveAgent
trainingPhrases: I need to speak with a live person
Can I talk to a human agent?
Transfer me to an agent
I want to speak with someone
This is urgent, I need a live agent
Connect me to customer service
I need help from a real person
Can you transfer me to a representative?
I'd like to speak with an agent
Put me through to someone who can help
Agent please
Live support needed
fulfillmentMessages: I'll connect you with a live agent right away.
Let me transfer you to one of our specialists who can assist you further.
I'm connecting you to a live agent now. Please hold for just a moment.

metadata.description: Provider-specific intents for CMS call center system
